name: Time for love
description:
Dodge obstacles to your relationship as much as possible ! (Clue : The closer you are, more points you score)

(Don't forget to put on full screen, see bottom right corner)

  • Play with arrow keys and w,a,s,d
  • Can be played with two players (playing solo is possible but it requires more skills)

Made by me in approximately 5 hours for Trijam#106 : Time is relative:

  • 1 hour and half for GameDesign, ideas
  • 3 hours and 26 min for actual implementation, code (which is the time counted out for the jam)

It's my fifth game with Gdevelop ! I've never been so close to making a game in 3 hours.
